languages.text: {n}Вы замечаете, что группа не монолитна. Часть ее членов более тяжело вооружены и следуют за грузным {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножрецом{/g}, закованным в боевую броню. Другие держатся на почтительной дистанции и вопросительно посматривают на своего лидера, высокого и сгорбленного.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Вы замечаете, что группа не монолитна. Часть ее членов более тяжело вооружены и следуют за грузным {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножрецом{/g}, закованным в боевую броню. Другие держатся на почтительной дистанции и вопросительно посматривают на своего лидера, высокого и сгорбленного.{/n}

languages.text: {n}You note that the group is not monolithic. Some of its members are more heavily armed and follow a large {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} clad in battle armour. Others keep a respectful distance and cast enquiring looks at their own leader, whose hunched posture belies his tall frame.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы замечаете, что группа не монолитна. Часть ее членов более тяжело вооружены и следуют за грузным {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножрецом{/g}, закованным в боевую броню. Другие держатся на почтительной дистанции и вопросительно посматривают на своего лидера, высокого и сгорбленного.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You note that the group is not monolithic. Some of its members are more heavily armed and follow the large {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} clad in battle armour. Others are keeping a respectful distance and casting quizzical looks at their tall, hunched leader.{/n}

Others keep a respectful distance and cast enquiring looks at their own leader, whose hunched posture belies his tall frame.{/n}

Others keep a respectful distance and cast enquiring looks at their own leader, whose hunched posture belies his tall frame.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたはその集団がモノリスではないことに気づく。メンバーの一部は重武装で戦闘アーマーを着た巨大な{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}の後に続いている。それ以外のメンバーは敬意を表して距離を取り、長身を丸めたリーダーに奇妙な視線を送っていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You note that the group is not monolithic. Some of its members are more heavily armed and follow a large {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} clad in battle armour. Others keep a respectful distance and cast enquiring looks at their own leader, whose hunched posture belies his tall frame.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたはその集団がモノリスではないことに気づく。メンバーの一部は重武装で戦闘アーマーを着た巨大な{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}の後に続いている。それ以外のメンバーは敬意を表して距離を取り、長身を丸めたリーダーに奇妙な視線を送っていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你注意到，这些人分成了两派。其中一派的领头人是个身材壮硕、身披战甲的{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术神甫{/g}，他的手下全副武装，追随在他身后。而剩下的人则恭敬地保持着距离，以探询的目光看着他们瘦削、驼背的领头人。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You note that the group is not monolithic. Some of its members are more heavily armed and follow a large {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} clad in battle armour. Others keep a respectful distance and cast enquiring looks at their own leader, whose hunched posture belies his tall frame.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你注意到，这些人分成了两派。其中一派的领头人是个身材壮硕、身披战甲的{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术神甫{/g}，他的手下全副武装，追随在他身后。而剩下的人则恭敬地保持着距离，以探询的目光看着他们瘦削、驼背的领头人。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du bemerkst, dass die Gruppe keine Einheit bildet. Einige Mitglieder sind schwerer bewaffnet und folgen einem hochgewachsenen {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriester{/g} in Kampfrüstung. Andere halten einen respektvollen Abstand und werfen erwartungsvolle Blicke auf ihren Anführer, dessen gebeugte Haltung seine Statur verschleiert.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You note that the group is not monolithic. Some of its members are more heavily armed and follow a large {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} clad in battle armour. Others keep a respectful distance and cast enquiring looks at their own leader, whose hunched posture belies his tall frame.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du bemerkst, dass die Gruppe nicht einheitlich ist. Einige Mitglieder sind schwerer bewaffnet und folgen dem großen {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriester{/g} in Schlachtrüstung. Andere halten respektvoll Abstand und werfen fragende Blicke auf ihren hochgewachsenen, aber gebeugten Anführer.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous songez que ce groupe est étrangement hétérogène. Certains de ses membres sont plus lourdement armés que les autres et suivent un grand {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtre{/g} en armure de combat, alors que d'autres restent à distance respectueuse et lancent des regards interrogateurs à leur chef dont la posture voûtée peine à dissimuler la stature.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You note that the group is not monolithic. Some of its members are more heavily armed and follow a large {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} clad in battle armour. Others keep a respectful distance and cast enquiring looks at their own leader, whose hunched posture belies his tall frame.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous songez que ce groupe est étrangement hétérogène. Certains de ses membres sont plus lourdement armés que les autres et suivent un grand {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtre{/g} en armure de combat, alors que d'autres restent à distance respectueuse et lancent des regards interrogateurs à leur chef dont la posture voûtée peine à dissimuler la stature.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Adviertes la heterogeneidad del grupo. Algunos de sus miembros están mejor armados y siguen a un inmenso {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdote{/g} pertrechado con un arnés de combate. Otros mantienen una distancia prudencial y lanzan miradas inquisitivas a su líder, cuya postura encorvada no es impedimento para su imponente altura.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You note that the group is not monolithic. Some of its members are more heavily armed and follow a large {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} clad in battle armour. Others keep a respectful distance and cast enquiring looks at their own leader, whose hunched posture belies his tall frame.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Adviertes que el grupo no es monolítico. Algunos de sus miembros están mejor armados y siguen al inmenso {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdote{/g} pertrechado con el arnés de combate. Otros mantienen una distancia prudencial y lanzan miradas indecisas a su alto y encorvado líder.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Grubun farklı alt gruplardan oluştuğunu fark ediyorsun. Üyelerin bazıları daha silahlı ve savaş zırhına bürünmüş, büyük bir {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahip'i{/g} takip ediyor. Diğerleri ise kambur duruşu, uzun yapısını gizleyen liderlerine sorgulayıcı bakışlar atar hâlde, düzeyli bir mesafeden izliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You note that the group is not monolithic. Some of its members are more heavily armed and follow a large {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} clad in battle armour. Others keep a respectful distance and cast enquiring looks at their own leader, whose hunched posture belies his tall frame.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Grubun farklı alt gruplardan oluştuğunu fark ediyorsun. Üyelerin bazıları, daha silahlı ve savaş zırhlarına bürünmüş, büyük bir {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahip{/g}'i takip ediyor. Diğerleri ise saygılı bir mesafeden izliyor, kambur duruşu uzun yapısını gizleyen kendi liderlerine sorgulayıcı bakışlar atıyorlar.{/n}
